org.hibernate.ogm.datastore.spi

Interface DatastoreConfiguration<G extends GlobalContext<?,?>>

  • Type Parameters:
    G - the type of GlobalContext supported by the represented datastore
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouchDB, Ehcache, Infinispan, MapDatastore, MongoDB, Neo4j

    public interface DatastoreConfiguration<G extends GlobalContext<?,?>>
    Implementations represent a specific datastore to the user and allow to apply store-specific configuration settings.

    Implementations must provide a no-args constructor.

    Author:
    Gunnar Morling
    See Also:
    Configurable.configureOptionsFor(Class)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      G getConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationContext context)
      Returns a new store-specific GlobalContext instance.

    • Method Detail

      • getConfigurationBuilder

        G getConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationContext context)
        Returns a new store-specific GlobalContext instance. Used by the Hibernate OGM engine during bootstrapping a session factory, not intended for client use.
        Parameters:
        context - configuration context to be used as factory for creating the global context object
        Returns:
        a new GlobalContext
